attributes.additional_details: I think electric scooters being legal would help people transport to other areas faster and would overall benefit the people of the UK
attributes.background: I think the government can make electric scooters legal but under a permit and under 16s can use them

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Legalise the use of e-scooters for under 16s on public roads
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731255
